title: Poison Fruit: The Slave & The Master's Sons
description: During the Civil War, Alicia, a slave girl on a Georgia Plantation is raped and murdered by her Master’s sons. Her fiance, Casey, is accused of the crime. He is tied to a post and suffers a severe whipping and he almost dies. While Casey is recovering from his wounds and asleep, Alicia comes to him. She tells Casey that she can not enter Heaven until the Master’s sons are sent to judgement. Casey and Alicia plan how make that happen and they succeed.
author: R.W. Raymond
